column4: okay... wait, ive used pastebin before, but i dont know how to get to it
sorry, i havent really used pastebin much
I think gparted can do it. not while it's mounted though
cause it's huge, and i want to put all my music on my ntfs part so i can listen to it in both windows and linux
but if i unmount it, wouldnt that mean i couldnt use linux anymore?  i mean, i think that's right
well lucky me, i already have one
you can't unmount the root file system
alright, so i just need to boot up the live cd, but will gparted be on it?  wait, i think my knopix cd has qtparted on it.
yeah. it always makes the window way way to big to fit the desktop for me though
that sounds rather complicated... but if i were to do that, i would just take the 15 or so gb and make that fat32
but I think you can manage
